LightningComponentBundle.description: Monitors field changes via CDC and displays configurable toast notifications

property.name: fieldMonitoringApiName
property.label: Monitored Field
property.description: API name of the field to be monitored (e.g.: Status__c, ApprovalStatus__c)

property.name: toastTitle
property.label: Toast Title
property.description: Title with automatic merge fields support: {oldValue}, {newValue}, {recordId}, {objectName}

property.name: toastMessage
property.label: Toast Message
property.description: Message with automatic merge fields processing when detected

property.name: toastVariant
property.label: Notification Type
property.description: Defines the color and icon of the toast

property.name: toastMode
property.label: Display Mode
property.description: Controls how the toast is closed by the user

property.name: forceRefreshView
property.label: Force Page Refresh
property.description: If checked, automatically updates the page after showing the toast

property.name: refreshDelayMs
property.label: Refresh Delay (ms)
property.description: Wait time before updating the page (in milliseconds)

property.name: showOnlyOnce
property.label: Show Only Once
property.description: If checked, shows the toast only on the first detected change

property.name: helpVariables
property.label: ðŸ“‹ Available Variables
property.description: List of all dynamic variables that can be used in messages
property.default: {oldValue} - Previous field value | {newValue} - Current value | {recordId} - Record ID | {objectName} - Object name

property.name: helpExamples
property.label: ðŸ“ Usage Examples
property.description: Practical examples of how to use dynamic variables
property.default: Title: 'Status Updated' | Message: 'Field changed from {oldValue} to {newValue}' | Title: 'Approval Completed!' | Message: 'Record {recordId} was approved' | Title: '{objectName} Modified' | Message: 'New value: {newValue}'

property.name: helpTip
property.label: ðŸ’¡ Usage Tip
property.description: Important tip for using dynamic variables
property.default: Copy and paste the variables into your messages. Enable 'Process Merge Fields' so variables are replaced with real values.

property.name: debugMode
property.label: Debug Mode
property.description: If checked, displays detailed logs in the browser console
